title: Butternut squash with Persian pistachio pesto, feta and pomegranate seeds
description: Big chunks of butternut squash are roasted until the edges are nicely caramelised and then topped with a pistachio pesto, feta and pomegranate seeds.
ingredients: 1 large butternut squash, quartered lengthways (skin-on) and seeds removed
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 hot red chilli or 1 tbsp chilli oil (optional)
